entry.data:
CLEAR AND NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH LATE THIS EVENING

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

RAIN, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY AND COOLER
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
